ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] thulian claw hype?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Claw is 19 delay.  Whip is 28 delay. [ 8-12]/19 = 0.421 - 0.632 [14-16]/28 = 0.500 - 0.571 If you parse your files, I suspect you ll find the claw is
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 31 Mar 2000, Bill Costlow wrote:

> The head of my guild just sold me a claw. (Actually,
> I will pay later since I don't have that much...)
>
> Problem is, I see damage of 8-12 using the claw and
> 14-16 using my barbed leather whip. The Whip cost me
> 50 pp, the claws will cost me 200. I don't see the
> point.

Claw is 19 delay. Whip is 28 delay.

[ 8-12]/19 = 0.421 - 0.632
[14-16]/28 = 0.500 - 0.571

If you parse your files, I suspect you'll find the claw is
actually doing more damage over time than the whip. It will
become even better as you pass level 20, since there's a
level-based constant added to your primary weapon damage -
that favors faster weapons.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
